titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exempt small manufacturers from the capitalization rules added by the Tax Reform Act of 1986.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/25/1988--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from the required application of uniform inventory cost capitalization rules the relevant costs of a taxpayer-manufacturer whose receipts for the preceding three years are $10,000,000 or less.
